civ.name: China
civ.info:
China as a culture and military entity is one of the longest existing on Earth. It begun with creation of Chinese Empire (which although many times shattered) managed to survive to modern era, when it was replaced with Communist China.
Chinese traits are Militaristic and Scientific - they represent Chinese ingeniuity (paper, gunpowder, kite, press have their origin in China) and military power as they were and are one of global superpowers.
Chinese leaders include greatest emperors and chairmans of Chinese Communist Party. China's color is yellow - backgound color of Qing Dynasty flag.

civ.name: Majapahit
civ.info:
Majapahit was a major maritime empire in the territory of modern day Indonesia. In fact it was the last major buddhist-hinduist empire in the region. Its territory covered the lands of Indonesia, Singapore, Malaysia Brunei and Thailand.
Majaphit's traits are Nautical and Nautical that represent the islandbased character of the country.
Majapahit's leaders include kings of Majapahit. Majaphit's color is gold - the color of Surya Majapahit, the symbol of Majapahit.

civ.name: Egypt
civ.info:
Ancient Egypt is a state that survived 3000 years and developed massive cultural heritage that can be seen to this day - for example Pyramids. Egypt can be considered one of the first major emipres in the human history.
Egypt's traits are Economic and Reliqious to represent the power it had to build great buildings and irrigate Nile.
Egypt's leaders include pharaohs from all 3 ancient Egyptian kingdoms. Egypt's color is orange - the color of Red Crown.

civ.name: England
civ.info:
England is a kingdom that was forged in early medieval age. It not only survived to this day, unified entire island, but also managed to create the biggest empire known to humankind.
English traits are Militaristic and Nautical to represent the colonial power of England.
English leaders include kings, queens and prime ministers of the monarchy. English color is red from English flag - the Union Jack.

civ.name: America
civ.info:
America or United States of America is one of the strongest modern empires. Its power emerged during world wars, when America shown itself as industrial, economical and scientific powerhouse, which later succeeded in defeating Soviet Union during Cold War.
American traits are Scientific and Economic, they represent the economical and scientific power of America.
American leaders include american presidents. American color is blue from american flag.

civ.name: Inca
civ.info:
Incan Empire was the biggest empire of South America before european colonization. Although its existence was short it made amazing achivements, like panandean road system or building of Macchu Picchu.
Incan traits are Militaristic and Agricultural, they represent the power it held in the region and its unique terrace farming system.
Incan leaders include Sapa Incas and resistance leaders. Incan color is green, one of the colors of rainbow on Sapa Inca banner.

civ.name: Babylon
civ.info:
Ancient Babylon or Babylonia was a state that emerged between rivers Euphrates and Tigris. Although it wasn't as big as other empires it made major scientific and cultural advances, such as one of the first writing systems, mathematical and astronomical discoveries, and building of Hanging Gardens.
Babylonian traits are Scientific and Cultural, they represent the cultural impact of Babylonia.
Babylonian leaders include kings from various dynasties. Babylonian color is grey.

civ.name: Congo
civ.info:
Congo in medieval age was inhabitated by many local tribes and in 1390 they managed to create Kingdom of Kongo, which survived to 1914. Right now region of Congo is split between two republics. Mainly it is Democratic Republic of Congo, it is 11th biggest country in the world and it has many valuable ores and other mining valuables.
Congolese traits are Cultural and Religious which represent cultural heritage of independent Kingdom of Kongo.
Congolese leaders include DRC presidents, Brazzaville presidents and medieval kings. Congolese color is dark green that can be found on Kingdom of Kongo coat of arms.

civ.name: Rome
civ.info:
Ancient Rome is one of greatest ancient empires that ever existed. Born from Roman Republic (one of the first republics in the world) it spaned from british islands to Egypt. Its impact on Europe was very big, many current capitals were founded by romans.
Roman traits are Economical and Expansive, they represent economical power of Rome and its maritime character.
Roman leaders include roman emperors. Roman color is purple.

civ.name: Mongolia
civ.info:
Mongol Empire although short-lived was the largest contiguous empire in history. Mongols united by Genghis Khan conquered lands from Eastern Europe to China.
Mongolia's traits are Nomadic and Militaristic, to represent the nomadic empire strength.
Mongol leaders are medieval khans. Mongol color is brown that can be found on the modern-day Mongolia's flag.

civ.name: Brittany
civ.info:
Brittany is a historical kingdom in France (currently a region). Unified in 846 by Nominoe, it was independent until 1532 when it became part of France.
Breton trait is Cultural, to represent the importance of ports in Nantes and the cultural independence from France.
Breton leaders are various kings and dukes. Breton color is black - one of two colors on their flag.

civ.name: Persia
civ.info:
At one point home to 44% of all humans, the Acheamenid Persian empire was the largest empire by precentage of population in history. It's known for it's effective administration and releative benevolence compared to its predecesors. Although the Achaemenids were later conquered by Alexander the Great, subsequent Persian states, like the Parthian, Sasanian, Safavid and Afsharid empires, continued to rule parts of the middle east up to and beyond the islamic conquest of Persia. Persian culture, religion and philosophy influenced their neighbours, and to this day areas from eastern Turkey to central Asia belong to the Persian cultural sphere.
Persian traits are Economic and Cultural - they represent the famous Persian royal roads that linked the empire of Cyrus the Great and the lasting cultural influence of the Persian empires
Persian leaders include the rulers of the Acheamenid, Parthian, Sassanian and Safavid dynasties. Persia's color is aquamarine - one of the possible colors of the Acheamenid standard.

civ.name: Germany
civ.info:
Germany is important european nation. It has been shaping politics of the continent from medieval era to this day.
German traits are Militaristic and Commercial to represent the industrial power of modern Germany and the heritage of Hansa.
German leaders include Chancellors and Kaisers. German color is black a color that has many times appeared on their flag.

civ.name: Khmer
civ.info:
Khmer Empire was a major South Asian Empire that existed in 802-1431 period. It controled most of mainland Southeast Asia and constructed great temples such as Ankgor Wat.
Khmer traits are Cultural and Expansive to represent major impact of the empire on the region.

civ.name: Songhay
civ.info:
The Songhay empire was the largest empire in West African history. It was able to amass great wealth due to trade across the Sahara and on the Niger river. Under the Songhay, the university of Timbuktu became well known as a centre of science trouought the muslim world.
Songhay traits are Religious and Commercial to represent the trade impact on the empire and its religious-scientific character
Songhay leaders include Songhay emperors Songhay color is red from Mali Emipre flag

civ.name: Maya
civ.info:
Mayan Civilizarion was on of the most important native cultures of America. It has never became a centralized empire, its famous for its astronomical and scientific advances.
Mayan traits are Scientific and Scientific to represent their astronomical advances
Mayan leader include various city-state leaders. Mayan color is green from on of mayan flags.

civ.name: Poland
civ.info:
Poland is a central european nation that formed powerful kingdom in early medieval age. Later its power fell, but Poland survived to this day.
Polish traits are Agricultural and Cultural to represent the historical importance of wheat farming and the polish tradition which survived years of occupation and wars.
Polish leaders include kings, presidents and first secretaries. Polish color is red from polish flag.

civ.name: Russia
civ.info:
Russia is one of the biggest empires on the planet. It always had a great impact on the politics.
Russian traits are Militaristic and Militaristic to represent russian military.
Russian leaders are tsars of Russian Empire. Russian color is yellow from Russian Empire flag.

civ.name: France
civ.info:
France is an important european country. Not only it was a colonial superpower and it participated in both world wars and shaped world politics, but also ideas of freedom, equality and democracy have been born here.
French traits are Cultural and Militaristic to represent the impact of First French Republic and military power of this former colonial power.
French leaders are kings, emperors and presidents of France. French color is blue from its flag.

civ.name: Maurya
civ.info:
Maurya Empire although relatively shortlived (it existed for 150 years) was one of the strongest powers that have ever existed in Indian Subcontinent. Chandragupts - its creator managed to unite most of Indian territory under his rule.
Mauryan traits are Expanisve and Religious, Expansive because of the scale of conquests made by Chandragupta and Religious because Maurya Empire had major role in spreading Jainism in India.
Mauryan leaders include its kings. Mauryan color is blue from one of its possible flags.

civ.name: Tuʻi Tonga
civ.info:
Tui'Tongan Empire was longlived Oceanian maritime empire that lasted over 2000 years. Tongan people managed to sail thousands of kilometers over oceans and exchange goods, trade and spread their culture. It has been formed in 950 BC and collapsed in 1500 AD, it was of the most important empires in territory of Oceania.
Tongan traits are Nautical and Cultural, they represent maritime character of the empire.
Tongan leaders are various kings of the empire. Tongan color is blue from modern Tonga coat of arms.

civ.name: Sikh
civ.info:
Sikh Empire was a religious state that emerged in 1799 in Subcontinent of India. It controlled terittories of Kashmir until eventually defeated in war with England.
Sikh traits are Religious and Religious to represent the religious character of this state, but also religion freedom it gave.
Sikh leaders include Maharajas and Vizirs that ruled it. Sikh color is green from Nishan Sahib introducted by Ranjit Singh - the founder of the empire.

civ.name: Ethiopia
civ.info:
Ethiopia is african country located in Horn of Africa. It has long history, originated in ancient era and survived to this day as democratic republic.
Ethiopian traits are Religious and Agricultural to represent the Ethiopian Christian Church and the main economic factor of its economy.
Ethiopian leaders include Emperors of Ethiopia and democratic leaders. Ethiopian color is brown, color of lion on the Empire of Ethiopia flag.

civ.name: Japan
civ.info:
Japan is islandbased country in Asia. Although it is relatively small it is economic and technological superpower. It has been united under rule of emperor between 4th and 9th centuries and to this day remains a monarchy.
Japanese traits are Militaristic and Religious to represent the power of Shogunate and class of Samurais.
Japanese leaders include Shoguns, Emperors and Prime Ministers. Japanses color is white, present on its flag.

civ.name: Macedonia
civ.info:
Macedonia was a small ancient kingdom estabilished in 808 BC, located in modernday Greece. Under rule of Philip II is defeated its neighbours and under his son Alexander the Great for a brief moment in time it has been the greatest empire in the world.
Macedonian traits are Expansive and Expansive, to represent massive epxansion under rule of Alexander.
Macedonian leaders include kings of Macedonia. Macedonian color is light yellow - color of Vergina Sun.

civ.name: Iroquois
civ.info:
Iroquois or Haudenosaunee tribe is a North American native tribe. During colonization era Iroquois with their neighbours formed Iroquois Confederacy - a state-like organization that lead to peace between tribes.
Iroquois traits are Cultural and Nomadic, to represent the project of Great Law of Peace.
Iroquois leaders include variuos chiefs. Iroquois color is purple from flag of the Confederacy.

civ.name: Spain
civ.info:
Spain as a united country was created in late XV century by Isabella I of Castille and Ferdinand II of Aragon. Before unification Spain was territory of wars between Muslims on the South and Catholics on the North. Most important Catholic countries were Leon and Castille (which later changed into Castille-Leon) and Aragon. After fall of muslim Caliphate and Taifas and later Unification of Castille and Aragon Spain wasn't controlled by Spanish dynasty for long because in early XVI century Habsburg family got crown of Spain. In the same time giant colonial Empire of Spain was created. After death of Charles II War of The Spanish Succession started and changed ruling dynasty to Bourbons who are ruling Spain with small breaks until today. While having king Spain is now constitutional monarchy and in time between Napoleonic Era to 70' of XX century there was two Republics and one dictatorship.
Spanish traits are Commerical and Expansive to represent the power of its colonial empire, once greatest in the world.
Spanish leaders include kings and democratic leaders. Spanish color is red from its actuall flag.

civ.name: Zulu
civ.info:
Zulu are ethnic group in South Africa. In XIX century under the lead of Shaka they formed a powerful militaristic kingdom which fought with England and Boer Republics. In 1897 the kingdom finally got defeated by England.
Zulu traits are Militaristic and Economic, to represent the power of Shaka's kingdom.
Zulu leaders include Zulu Kingdom chiefs. Zulu color is brown - color of their traditional shields.

civ.name: Argentina
civ.info:
Argentina is second largest country in South America. In early XX century it was one of the richest countries on the planet, its GNP per capita was higher than in USA. The Great Depression however changed that and Argentinian economical situation never was that good again. Nontheless Argentina is important regional power.
Argentinian traits are Religious and Nautical, to represent the importance of resource exports in GNP of Argentina and importance of religion (in fact pope Francias is from Argentina).
Argentinian leaders include various leaders. Argentinian color is light blue from its flag.

city.name: Santa Fe de la Vera Cruz
San Fernando del Valle de Catamarca
San Fernando de la Buena Vista
San Ramón de la Nueva Orán

civ.name: Brazil
civ.info:
Brazil is the biggest country in South America. It has 9th strongest economy in the world. It is surely a major power in world politics.
Brazilian traits are Economic and Commerical, to represent its power as "emerging economy".
Brazilian leaders include emperors, kings and presidents of Brazil. Brazilian color is green - the background color of its flag.
